scripts.clean: rimraf -f build/ && rimraf -f docs/ && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir gen && cd .. && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir grammar && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run nyc
scripts.grammkit: cd docs && cd grammar && grammkit -t md ../../build/fsl-peg.pegjs && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run make_peg && npm run mk_parser && npm run rollup && npm run minify
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run test && npm run doc && npm run site
scripts.make_peg: concat -o build/fsl-peg.pegjs src/peg/function_preamble.pegjs src/peg/preamble.pegjs src/peg/attributes.pegjs src/peg/expression_and_subexpression.pegjs src/peg/doc_structure.pegjs src/peg/url.pegjs src/peg/graphviz_controls.pegjs src/peg/label.pegjs src/peg/licenses.pegjs src/peg/numbers.pegjs src/peg/semver.pegjs src/peg/named_color.pegjs src/peg/color.pegjs src/peg/arrow.pegjs src/peg/arrow_rest.pegjs src/peg/shape.pegjs src/peg/stripe_and_cycle.pegjs src/peg/machine_config.pegjs src/peg/machine_config_transitions.pegjs src/peg/machine_config_states.pegjs src/peg/arrow_head_types.pegjs src/peg/state_declaration.pegjs src/peg/named_list.pegjs
